channel.title: Latin-American on Loving my tummy
channel.description: Recent content in Latin-American on Loving my tummy

item.title: Cockles ceviche
item.description: You can substitute the can of cockles with a can of clams. Put the contents of the can of cockles in a glass jar, including the liquid. Cut the avocado into cubes and add it to the jar. Slice the onion into thin strips and add it to the jar. Add the rest of the ingredients to the jar. Close the jar and mix it well. Serve in a bowl. From Instagram @fitfoodmania.

item.title: Esquites
item.description: Mix all the ingredients in a glass. From Tako Away.

item.title: Quesadilla
item.description: As the main ingredient, you can use your favourite protein (chicken, turkey, tuna, salmon, etc.). Place one tortilla in the air fryer. Cover with the main ingredient (e.g., chicken) and half of the cheese, spreading them evenly. Cover with the second tortilla. Place a metal rack on top to prevent the tortilla from flying off. Set the air fryer to 190째C (375째F) for 6 minutes. Halfway through, remove the rack, flip the quesadilla, cover with the remaining shredded cheese, and sprinkle with oregano.

item.title: Super Mexican pizza
item.description: Preheat the oven: Preheat to 220째C (430째F) or follow the pizza dough package instructions. Place a pizza stone or baking sheet in the oven to heat up. Prepare the base: Roll out the pizza dough to your desired thickness and place it on a sheet of parchment paper for easy handling. Spread an even layer of tomato sauce over the dough. Add toppings: Sprinkle the shredded mozzarella cheese evenly over the base.
